description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Defend the space station with your trusty blaster or a host of automatic laser weapons.  Play online against your friends or offline against computer controlled opponents. Rank up to unlock weapons and perks in this all out laser attack!
description.short: Defend the space station with your trusty blaster or a host of automatic laser weapons.  Play online against your friends or offline against computer controlled opponents. Rank up to unlock weapons and perks in this all out laser attack!
